SELECT a.pure_date,a.order_id,sum(push) as '推送量',sum(sel) as '优选量',sum(imp) as '曝光量',sum(click) as '点击量',
sum(case when a.ta>=b.ta_score and ta_score!=0 then push else 0 end) as '推送ta量',
sum(case when ta>=ta_score and ta_score!=0 then sel else 0 end) as '优选ta量',
sum(case when ta>=ta_score and ta_score!=0 then imp else 0 end) as '曝光ta量' 
from rm_report_basicinfo  a join rmos_order b on a.campaign_id=b.campaign_id and a.order_id=b.order_id  
where pure_date>=20180629 and pure_date<=20180909 and a.order_id in (
2255761,2255762,2255763,2255764,2255765,2255766,2255767,2255768,2255769,2255770,2255771,2255772,2255773,2255774,2255775,2255776,2255777,2255778,2255779,2255780,2255781,2255782,2255783,2255784,2255785,2255786,2255787,2255788,2255789,2255790,2255791,2255792,2255793,2256163,2256164,2256165,2256166,2256167,2256168,2256169,2256170,2256171,2256172,2256173,2256174,2256175,2256176,2256177,2256178,2256179,2256180,2256181,2256182,2256183,2256184,2256185,2256186,2256187,2256188,2256189,2256190,2256191,2256192,2256193,2256194,2256195,2256284,2256285,2256286,2256287,2256288,2256289,2256290,2256291,2256292,2256293,2256294,2256295,2256296,2256297,2256298,2256299,2256300,2256301,2256302,2256303,2256304,2256305,2256306,2256307,2256308,2256309,2256310,2256311,2256312,2256313,2256314,2256315,2256316
)
group by 1,2
